translation.en: -I brought you this. -[girl] Awesome, Mom. Thank you so much.
translation.zh: 给你买了这个 太棒了 妈妈 谢谢！

translation.en: -[woman 1] Yeah, of course. -Sleeping in the car.
I should have something for you by the end of the week.
translation.zh: 到周末我应该能筹给你
-严格地说我不用去 奶奶 -诺亚

translation.en: [woman 2] I have a church meeting tonight. Can you keep 'em until 7:00?
translation.zh: 我今晚教堂有活动 七点送他们回来 好吗？

translation.en: Maybe they could stay the night?
translation.zh: 要不他们在我那儿过夜？

translation.en: -[woman 2] You're welcome to join us. -I'll think about it.
translation.zh: -也欢迎你和我们一起 -我考虑一下

translation.en: So, how was school this week?
-Did you know birds come from dinosaurs? -[woman 1] I did.
translation.zh: -你知道鸟是从恐龙进化来的吗？ -知道

translation.en: -Why are we even doing this? -[woman 1] I'm tired, Noah. Okay?
translation.zh: -我们为什么要这样？ -我累了 诺亚 好吗？

translation.en: I just worked the night shift,
and I'm doing everything I can to get you guys back. All right? So...
translation.zh: 我在尽全力争取你们回来 好吧？

translation.en: [Noah] I don't want you to feel bad, but I don't want to pretend that...
translation.zh: 我不希望你们不开心 但我也不想假装…

translation.en: What did you do? -Nothing, I-- -[tires squealing]

translation.zh: -刹车 妈妈 刹车！ -抓稳
妈的！ 宝贝 你没事吧？
嗯 我没事 妈妈

translation.en: -What do we do? -[woman 1] Come to me. Quick!
You okay? Are you all right? Take off your seat belt right now.
translation.zh: -你没事吧？ -没事 -快把安全带解开 -好的

translation.en: It's okay, I'm right here. Everything's gonna be okay.
translation.zh: 我就在这里 会没事的

translation.en: Come towards Mommy. Okay, right now! Come towards Mommy. Quick! I need you to go faster, baby.
translation.zh: 到妈妈这里来 好的 快！ 快一点 宝贝

translation.en: -Come on, it's gonna be okay. Go! -[Matilda] Mom!
translation.zh: 加油 会没事的 来！

translation.en: -Come on, Noah. Get out! -I can't! My belt's stuck!
translation.zh: 加油 诺亚 出去！
你没事吧？ 玛蒂尔达！

translation.en: [sheriff] She was out for a minute, but she's gonna be fine.
translation.zh: -她刚才失去知觉一分钟 -宝贝！ -不过她会没事的 -非常感谢

translation.en: -[sheriff] She's good. She's good. -Thank you. Thank you.
-[sheriff] I don't know what happened. -Oh. Oh, baby.
translation.zh: -不知道怎么回事 -噢 宝贝！

translation.en: I don't think we're gonna get an ambulance here,
but the VA Hospital's just four blocks away, and... you're gonna need stitches.
translation.zh: 但是退伍军人医院 离这里只有四个街区 你得缝针

translation.en: [nurse] I'll be right there. Uh, Exam Room 3.

translation.zh: 哎 不好意思！不好意…

translation.en: Hey, excuse me. Um, I need a doctor.
translation.zh: 你好 不好意思 我需要一位医生

translation.en: Um, uh, we just got into a car accident and my daughter was, uh, spitting up water.
translation.zh: 我们刚出了交通意外 我女儿在吐水

translation.en: -[woman 1] Wh-- Hey! Hey! -[nurse 1] I need some help here!
It's a terrorist attack, for sure.
Terrorists? Able to shut off all the power...
translation.zh: 恐怖分子？ 有本事把电都停了？

translation.en: -to cars? -Maybe it was the Chinese, right?
translation.zh: -把车都停了？ -也许是中国人 对吧？

translation.en: They built all this shit so maybe they just turned it all off.
translation.zh: 东西都是他们造的 也许是被他们都关了

translation.en: Maybe they blew up New York and LA, and we're next.
translation.zh: 也许他们把纽约和洛杉矶炸了 接着就轮到我们

translation.en: -[patient screaming] -[nurse 2] I gave him ten cc's.
translation.zh: 我给他打了十毫升 犀牛都该倒下了！

translation.en: -That should put down a rhino! -[woman 3] Someone!
translation.zh: 我给他打了十毫升 犀牛都该倒下了！ 来人啊！

translation.en: [Doris] The phones aren't working, the power's out--
translation.zh: 电话都不管用了 停电了

translation.en: -Hey, Doris, you good on meds? -[Doris] I got plenty.
The store's not taking credit cards.
Do you have cash for food?
The cash was in the car. In the lake.
translation.zh: 现金在车里 车在湖里

translation.en: I-- I can see if I can pick something up on the way home from the university.
translation.zh: 不过从大学回家路上 我可以看看能不能买点什么

translation.en: I'm in at 6:00 a.m. tomorrow. I just need to get a little sleep.
translation.zh: 我明天早上六点上班 我要休息一下

translation.en: Yeah. They don't have power. They're gonna need security.
translation.zh: 对 停电了 会需要安保

translation.en: You know, there's no point in you walking home.
Why don't you spend the night?
[Doris] I don't know how you sleep like that.
translation.zh: 不知道你这样怎么睡得着
我不是在睡觉 是在冥想

translation.en: You know when you wake up in the morning, everything is good for a minute
translation.zh: 知道这种感觉吗？ 早上醒来时 在很短的时间内 一切都很美好

translation.en: I get that minute when I meditate.
translation.zh: 我冥想的时候就很美好

translation.en: I tried yoga when my hip started hurting, but...
translation.zh: 我屁股开始疼的时候 试过瑜伽

translation.en: Do you, uh... You have a little something to help me sleep?
translation.zh: 你有没有什么东西 能帮助我睡眠？

translation.en: You know the judge said that I wasn't allowed.
translation.zh: 你知道的 法官说不允许

translation.en: Well, I guess you really aren't using if you're awake too.
translation.zh: 如果你也睡不着 大概也不用那些东西

translation.en: I'll stop at the pharmacy and get you something.
translation.zh: 路过药店时 我给你买点药

translation.en: [woman 1] Why don't you get some sleep?
Look at all the shooting stars.
-Hey, hey, hey, I need more stuff. -Relax, okay?
translation.zh: -哎 我需要更多货 -别紧张 好吗？

translation.en: Downers, benzos, phennies, tooies, red jackets, people are crazy right now,
translation.zh: 镇定剂 苯巴比妥 巴比妥 速可眠 现在人都疯了 都兴奋得要命

translation.en: amped up. That shit'll be, like, gold. I'll double the price.
translation.zh: 现在人都疯了 都兴奋得要命 那些东西成金子了 我出双倍价钱

translation.en: No, fuck, I didn't say that.
translation.zh: 不对 操 当我没说

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, you did say that.
All right. I'll do it. Fucking Gregg's a man of his word, all right?
translation.zh: 好吧 没问题 他妈格雷格说话算话 好吧？

translation.en: Cash in, cash out. Cycle of life.
translation.zh: 钱进钱出 生命循环

translation.en: I'll double the price on all types of zombie pills. Come on.
translation.zh: 各种镇定剂我出双倍价钱 来吧

translation.en: [woman 4] How'd you get your cars to run, huh?
translation.zh: 哎 怎么回事？ 你们的车怎么开动的？ 为什么我们的车没法儿开？

translation.en: How come our cars aren't working? What the fuck is going on?
translation.zh: 你们的车怎么开动的？ 为什么我们的车没法儿开？ 他妈的怎么回事啊？

translation.en: Easy. I'm 68 Whiskey. Corporal Adams. Out of Fort Huachuca.
translation.zh: 别紧张 我是医疗兵 亚当斯下士 驻扎在华楚卡堡外

translation.en: What are you doing up here?
Not active anymore. I mean, I might be.
translation.zh: 不在现役了 可能要服役

translation.en: I don't know. They call in reserves yet? I just don't know.
translation.zh: 不知道 动员预备役了吗？ 我还不知道

translation.en: That's a lot of pills, Jill.
I can explain. It's not what it looks like, I promise.
translation.zh: 我可以解释 不是表面上那样 我保证

translation.en: -[woman 5] Pack those up for me, please. -[Jill] Yes, ma'am.
I know you stuck your neck out for me to get this job, and I am so appreciative,
translation.zh: 我知道你冒了风险 才帮我找到这份工作 我非常感激 我知道我没搞好…

translation.en: -and-- and I know I screwed up-- -I don't care.
translation.zh: 我非常感激 我知道我没搞好… 我不关心

translation.en: Was that an EMP yesterday? Are we at war?
translation.zh: 昨天是因为电磁脉冲炸弹吗？ 开战了吗？

translation.en: People are saying it's been happening all over. Who would we even attack?
translation.zh: 据说到处都这样 我们要攻击谁呢？

translation.en: Hard drives are useless. Anything with a microchip is fried.
translation.zh: -墨菲少校？ -硬盘没用了 有微型芯片的东西都坏了

translation.en: Here's everything I have on hard copy.
translation.zh: -这些是所有的纸质文件 -好的

translation.en: We were the "get answers" people over there. They need those people again.
translation.zh: 以前咱们是“寻找答案”的人 现在又需要这样的人了

translation.en: This is the location of the hub.
I'd like you to get Lori and my children, and...
translation.zh: 你接罗莉和我的孩子们

translation.en: get down there as soon as you can, all right?
translation.zh: 然后尽快去那里 好吗？

translation.en: [man 3] You don't understand how serious this is.
translation.zh: 你不明白这其中的严重性

translation.en: You should have gone with her.
How is Murphy gonna bring the power back? She's a psychiatrist.
translation.zh: 墨菲怎么能恢复电力供应呢？ 她是精神科医师

translation.en: There are contingencies for that. Replace enough wires and fuses...
translation.zh: 这方面有紧急处理方案 更换线缆和保险丝就行

translation.en: [exhaling] After 48 hours of no sleep, there's a loss of critical thinking.
translation.zh: 48小时不睡 就会失去正常思考的能力
69小时 出现幻觉和行动问题

translation.en: But what about after that? Organs will fail but then what?
translation.zh: 但是再之后呢？器官会衰竭 再之后呢？

translation.en: Days of lying in paralysis until the heart shuts off?
translation.zh: 瘫痪多日 直至心跳停止？

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, I know what happens.
translation.zh: 嗯 我知道会怎么样

translation.en: Symptoms are appearing two to three times quicker.
translation.zh: 症状出现的速度 比正常情况快两三倍

translation.en: It's gonna be total chaos. We're not all going to die.
translation.zh: -会一片混乱 -我们不会全死掉

translation.en: -Well, this is not happening to everyone. -Yes, it is.
translation.zh: -并不是每个人都出现这种情况 -你说错了

translation.en: Well, there is this one woman who can sleep.
translation.zh: 好吧 确实有一个女人能睡着

translation.en: They're bringing her to this hub.
Matilda was sleeping too. My daughter was sleeping.
translation.zh: 玛蒂尔达也睡得着 我女儿睡得着

translation.en: Jill, they're setting up a whole station based on this one sleeper.
translation.zh: 吉尔 整个工作站 就是为了这个入眠者而建

translation.en: That's how big of a deal she is.
Are you sure your daughter was sleeping?
Oh, I-I... I got into a car accident,
-but I'm fine. -Was your daughter also hurt?
translation.zh: -但是我没事 -你女儿也受伤了吗？

translation.en: I'm just saying, odds are she wasn't sleeping.
translation.zh: 我是说 有可能她之前并不是在睡觉

translation.en: What, do you think she's unconscious?
translation.zh: 什么？你觉得她是失去知觉吗？

translation.en: There are no such thing as unconscious people anymore.
translation.zh: 现在已经没有失去知觉的人了

translation.en: Where is she? Where is she? Where is she?
Where is your sister? Where is your sister? You're hurting me!
Where-- Where is Matilda? Is she okay?
translation.zh: 玛蒂尔达在哪里？她没事吧？
她在哪里？快说啊 诺亚

translation.en: Church. Grandma took her to church.
translation.zh: 在教堂 奶奶带她去教堂了

translation.en: Maybe we are meant to be awake.
'Cause you need to be woke to see how the world really is.
translation.zh: 因为要醒着才能看清世界

translation.en: And the Lord says, "Come to me, all who labor
translation.zh: 主说：“凡劳苦担重担的人

translation.en: and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest."
translation.zh: 可以到我这里来 我就使你们得安息”

translation.en: Only my dad called me that.
I'm sorry, I forgot. I'm just... tired.
translation.zh: 对不起 我忘了 我累了

translation.en: asked to be called to God, you know.
I know that more than most because before I was a pastor...
translation.zh: 我比大多数人都更清楚 因为在做牧师之前

translation.en: Covered up the evidence with a tattoo.
I mean, I should've died within hours, but I didn't.
translation.zh: 我本应该在几小时内死亡 但是我没有

translation.en: I had built up such an immunity to narcotics over the years, I just...
translation.zh: 多年来 我积累了对毒品的免疫力

translation.en: laid there for three days in rest...
But I was only gone for a minute when they found me.
translation.zh: 但当他们找发现我时 我才死了一分钟

translation.en: So, like Jesus, I... returned from the dead.
translation.zh: 所以我想耶稣一般 死而复生

translation.en: Now, I'm not comparing myself to Jesus. I just...
translation.zh: 我不是把自己比作耶稣

translation.en: since that day, I dedicated my life to serving him.
translation.zh: 从那天之后 我用自己的生命去侍奉他

translation.en: it was a miracle that I survived, you know?
And I think people really need a miracle right now.
translation.zh: 我想大家现在很需要一个奇迹

translation.en: You think I need to die?

translation.zh: 不是 对不起 不是

translation.en: It's just everyone is tired and... desperate, you know?
People just want to know if you can sleep.
translation.zh: 大家就是想知道你能不能睡着

translation.en: It's just hard when I'm not tired.
translation.zh: 只是在我不累的时候 很难睡着

translation.en: Would it be okay if I prayed with you?
translation.zh: 我可以和你一起祈祷吗？

translation.en: A lot of children say my prayers are so boring, they nod right off.
translation.zh: 很多孩子说我的祈祷很无聊 听了马上就睡着了

translation.en: Lord, we thank you for this day and we thank you for Matilda.
translation.zh: 主啊 为了今天我们感谢你 为了玛蒂尔达我们感谢你

translation.en: Uh, no, it's a test for mental sharpness.
translation.zh: 不是 是测试精神敏锐度

translation.en: -[Noah] How'd you do? -I-I got two wrong. It's fine.
translation.zh: -测试结果怎么样？ -错了两个数字 没事

translation.en: Uh, we need to go and find a car, and get your sister somewhere safe, okay?
translation.zh: 咱们得去找一辆车 把你妹妹送到安全的地方 好吧？

translation.en: -Cars don't work, Jill. -[sighing] Some do, Noah. Okay?
translation.zh: -车都动不了了 吉尔 -有些动得了 诺亚 好吧？

translation.en: So, can you just help me out, please?
translation.zh: 拜托帮帮我的忙 好吗？
-噢 妈的！ -你女儿 -她能睡着吗？ -什么？

translation.en: She can't sleep? Is she okay?
No, she's fine, she's fine. I was wrong. She was just pretending.
translation.zh: 没有 他挺好 我说错了 她之前是装的

translation.en: Jesus, Jill, we need to get your daughter to Murphy.
translation.zh: 神啊 吉尔 咱们得把你女儿送到墨菲那里

translation.en: -Look, she could be key. -Noah, we gotta go.
translation.zh: -她可能是关键 -诺亚 咱们得走了

translation.en: I know where the hub is.
They're setting up a station to help solve this.
translation.zh: 他们在建立一个工作站来解决问题

translation.en: Look, they already have this one sleeper.
translation.zh: 他们已经有一个入眠者

translation.en: Brian, we're not going there. Come on. Noah, let's go.
translation.zh: 布莱恩 我们不去 走吧 诺亚 咱们走

translation.en: [Jill yelling] Hey! Yo, that's my bike!
[pastor] In our basement, like an angel of peace,
translation.zh: 在我们的地下室 一位小女孩 像平天使一样睡着了
一位小女孩 像平天使一样睡着了

translation.en: So if she can sleep, -that means we can too. -[people murmuring]
translation.zh: 如果她能睡着 那意味着我们也能

translation.en: So, as all mankind lays awake, we pray for answers.
translation.zh: 所有的人类都醒着 我们祈求答案

translation.en: So what if she can sleep?
Just like good grows, if you believe in it,
translation.zh: 就像好的东西会生长一样 如果你相信 如果你去争取

translation.en: if you give it a fighting chance.
translation.zh: 如果你相信 如果你去争取

translation.en: [man 5] There is no over-the-counter sleeping pills left.
translation.zh: 非处方安眠药已经没有了！

translation.en: [man 6] Give us the stuff behind the counter!
translation.zh: -那就把处方药给我们嘛！ -你们得找你们的医生

translation.en: [man 5] You'll have to talk to your doctors. Get the notes.
translation.zh: -那就把处方药给我们嘛！ -你们得找你们的医生 开处方

translation.en: [man 6] You know no doctor's answering his phone. Please, I can't help you!
translation.zh: -你知道现在找不到医生了 -我帮不了你
来 诺亚 别停下

translation.en: It's only going to get worse.
Your mind will bend and bend until it breaks.
translation.zh: 脑子就会越来越不清醒 直到崩溃

translation.en: But it's adversity that prompts us to change
translation.zh: 但是 真是逆境 促使我们改变 否则我们不会改变
促使我们改变 否则我们不会改变

translation.en: -Matilda... -When are you gonna make us sleep?
translation.zh: -玛蒂尔达 -你什么时候让我们睡着？

translation.en: -Patience, please. -[man 7] I don't have patience right now.
Raymond isn't responding. He's eating but not talking.
translation.zh: 雷蒙德没反应 他吃东西 但是不说话

translation.en: -He's tired, just like the rest of us. -He's beyond tired.
translation.zh: -他累了 和我们大家一样 -他不止是累了

translation.en: -He'll be fine. -[woman 6] We should sacrifice her.
translation.zh: -他会没事的 -咱们应该牺牲她

translation.en: God sacrificed Jesus, his own son, to save us.
translation.zh: 神牺牲了自己的儿子耶稣 来拯救我们

translation.en: God willingly sacrificed himself for our sins.
translation.zh: 神自愿牺牲了自己 为了洗清我们的罪

translation.en: There is no sacrifice needed. We... We only need prayer.
translation.zh: 不需要牺牲 我们只要祈祷就行

translation.en: God help me, I'm willing to be Pontius Pilate
translation.zh: 上帝救我 我愿意做庞提乌斯·彼拉多 去给女孩判刑
我愿意做庞提乌斯·彼拉多 去给女孩判刑 罗伯特 坐下 坐下！够了
罗伯特 坐下 坐下！够了

translation.en: -[pastor] That's enough. -[man 7] What good is prayer?
translation.zh: 罗伯特 坐下 坐下！够了 祈祷有什么用？我们要睡眠
祈祷有什么用？我们要睡眠
-玛蒂尔达 -妈妈！ 哎 别过来

translation.en: Jill, we just wanted to pray with Matilda, that's it.
translation.zh: 吉尔 我们只想和玛蒂尔达一起祈祷

translation.en: She can sleep. Maybe she can help. Lord knows we all need help right now.
translation.zh: 她能睡着 也许她能帮我们 主知道我们现在都需要帮助

translation.en: Come on. Matilda is my daughter, and she's coming with me.
translation.zh: 拜托 玛蒂尔达是我女儿 她要跟我走

translation.en: -[woman 7] Not legally, she ain't. -Please, sit-- sit down.
translation.zh: -法律上她不是你女儿 -请坐下

translation.en: Doris... Doris takes care of those kids by law.
translation.zh: 在法律上 孩子们由多丽丝照顾

translation.en: But right now, with what's happening,
I can help, and you know I can help.
translation.zh: 我能帮忙 你知道的

translation.en: -[Jill] Okay, come on, Matilda. Let's go. -[Jim] She has to stay here.
translation.zh: -好的 来吧 玛蒂尔达 咱们走 -她必须留在这里
-牧师 你答应过我们 -请坐下

translation.en: [Brian] We're on the same team here.
[Brian] But she can't help anyone here.
translation.zh: 但是她在这里帮不了任何人

translation.en: Right now, your brains are slowly swelling.
translation.zh: 现在 你们的大脑在慢慢肿胀

translation.en: Our cranial walls are impressing on the brain,
translation.zh: 我们的颅骨在压迫大脑

translation.en: It's what happens when we don't sleep.
Now, the more excited we get,
the more blood flows to the brain, the worse we are.
translation.zh: 越多血液涌入大脑 我们的情况就越糟糕

translation.en: So, the best thing we can do right now... is take a deep breath...
translation.zh: 所以现在最好就是深呼吸

translation.en: Now, we're gathering scientists and doctors to help solve this.
translation.zh: 现在 我们在召集科学家和医生 来帮助解决这个问题

translation.en: And all they need is the girl.
No one dismisses the value of science,
translation.zh: 谁都不会否认科学的价值

translation.en: but neither is she a test subject to run experiments on...
translation.zh: 但是她也不是实验对象 不能拿她做实验

translation.en: -You're not taking her anywhere. -[pastor] Jim, please.
translation.zh: -你不能带走她 -吉姆 别这样

translation.en: -[woman 10] That's right. -Prayers are not gonna save--
if you don't hand her over, I'll be back with the Army,
translation.zh: 如果你们不把她交出来 我就带军队来

translation.en: and they're not gonna ask nicely.
-You calm down! -[Brian] Is that what you want?
translation.zh: -你冷静一点 -这就是你们要的吗？

translation.en: Because unless you people wake up, that is exactly what is gonna happen.
translation.zh: 如果你们不醒醒 结果就是会这样
吉姆 你怎么回事啊？

translation.en: [woman 7] Doris took her down the back.
translation.zh: 多丽丝 带她去后面

translation.en: Noah, Noah, look at me. You're gonna be okay. All right?
translation.zh: 诺亚 看着我 你会没事的 好吧？

translation.en: I need you to meet me in the forest out back. I'm gonna get your sister.
translation.zh: 咱们在树林里碰头 我去找你妹妹 好吧？

translation.en: -[man 9] Bring her out! -[man 10] Get her out here!
[man 9] She's not in there. Get the guys. Let's look out back.
translation.zh: 不在这里 带人到后面找

translation.en: [Doris] She's not in there? She was.
translation.zh: -她在哪里？ -她不在这里？ 刚才在的

translation.en: This isn't Jesus rising from the tomb, Doris.
translation.zh: 这不是耶稣从坟墓里复活 多丽丝

translation.en: This is not who we are.
Oh, my God, my baby. -Oh, baby. Oh, baby. -[Matilda whimpering]
-Grandma told me to run, but I couldn't. -Oh, that's okay.
translation.zh: -奶奶让我跑 但是我没办法 -噢 没事的

translation.en: -Are you okay? -Oh. No, I'm fine, baby. I'm fine.
translation.zh: -你没事吧？ -嗯 我挺好 宝贝
-求你了 -神对我说话了 牧师

translation.en: -Put it down. -[Jim] We can't let her leave.
Jim, put it-- put it down, please. You're scaring everyone.
translation.zh: 吉姆 放下 求你了 你吓着大家了
-加油 -妈 停一下 求你了！

translation.en: Your grandmother can't run, okay? She has a condition.
translation.zh: 你奶奶不能跑 好吗？她有病

translation.en: No, no, no, no. She's gonna be fine. -I need you to keep up with me, okay? -Okay.
translation.zh: 没事的 她不会有事 你要跟上我 好吗？
-好吧 爬上来 来吧 -好的

translation.en: [Jill] We're gonna need a car. You stay here.
translation.zh: 咱们需要一辆车 你们留在这里

translation.en: -You don't know what they're capable of. -But we need to find a cure.
translation.zh: 你不知道他们会做什么样的事 但是我们得找到解方

translation.en: It-- It's right here, wherever this-- this is.
translation.zh: 就在这里 这个地方

translation.en: I touched a dead body to get this. A dead body!
translation.zh: 我从死人身上拿出来的！
你打算怎么安排 吉尔？
咱们把玛蒂尔达带到安全的地方

translation.en: we both die, and she lives alone?
translation.zh: 然后咱俩都死掉 她一个人活着？

translation.en: That's the stupidest thing I've ever heard.
translation.zh: 这是我听过的最愚蠢的事

translation.en: -Burn it. Burn this, and we can't go. -Noah, stop that.
translation.zh: -把这个烧掉 咱们就去不了了 -诺亚 别这样

translation.en: If we're all gone, she'll be dead within days.
translation.zh: 如果我们都不在 她几天就没命了

translation.en: There's another woman there already. They're gonna find a cure. They will.
translation.zh: 另外还有一个女人 他们会找到解方 一定会

translation.en: [man 11] We got the pick of the litter. How about the Beemer instead?
translation.zh: 咱们随便选 要不选宝马吧？

translation.en: -[man 12] Idiot! It's gotta be an old car. -[soft thud]
Okay, can we focus? Get that Camry started?
translation.zh: 好吧 咱们别打岔了 把那辆凯美瑞启动起来

translation.en: World's in chaos and you're wasting time stomping heads.
translation.zh: 世界都乱成一团了 你却在浪费时间踩别人的头

translation.en: Why can't we do the Beemer?
[man 12] This is the last time I tell you.
We need an old car. No electronics.
translation.zh: 我们需要一辆没有电子部件的老车

translation.en: It had no battery in it when whatever the fuck was happening...
The Camaro or the Dodge should work with one of the older batteries.
translation.zh: 那辆科迈罗或者道奇 也许能用老电池

translation.en: Get in. Give it a shot.

translation.zh: 变速箱是新的 祈祷吧

translation.en: -[man 11] Tell me when you're ready. -[man 12] Yeah.
translation.zh: 准备好告诉我 好的

translation.en: [man 11] There it is. Told you we could boost the battery.
-[man 12] Sweet! -[man 11] Go get the keys for the Dodge.
translation.zh: 好的 去拿道奇的钥匙

translation.en: And grab the battery we brought up from the basement!
translation.zh: 带上我们从地下室拿的电池

translation.en: -I don't want a Polara. I want a Camaro. -[man 11] Just grab the keys, pendejo.
translation.zh: -我不要道奇老车 我要科迈罗 -去拿钥匙吧 白痴！

translation.en: [man 12] They're in here somewhere. You find 'em.
-Yo, you hear that? -[car accelerating in the distance]

translation.zh: -什么声音？ -你听到了 对吧？ 对

translation.en: Someone else got a car running, too.
translation.zh: 有别人也打着了一辆车

translation.en: Man, they were stocked up. Medical shit.
translation.zh: 哎 装满了医疗物资

translation.en: Bet they could sleep with that.
[man 11] Grab all the keys. We'll come back for the Dodge later.
translation.zh: 要是都拿好 回头再来拿道奇

translation.en: Did you guys ever... do it?
So, what happened with this girlfriend?
We're-- We're not going to talk about this right now.
Noah, come on. I basically-- I basically had you when I was your age.
translation.zh: 诺亚 拜托 我像你这么大的时候 都把你生下来了

translation.en: We do not need to have this conversation.
-But you can talk to me if you-- -[Noah] Are we done?
translation.zh: -不过你有话的话可以跟我… -说完了吗？

translation.en: Those were Murphy's guys that shot up that car.
translation.zh: 是墨菲的人把那辆车打成那样
我在海外和墨菲一起工作过

translation.en: She helped me get a job at the university and...
translation.zh: 她帮我在大学找了工作
她是精神科医师 诺亚

translation.en: In the desert, she would... help set parameters for interrogation.
translation.zh: 在沙漠里 她会帮助为审讯设置参数

translation.en: The kind of things that we would do to try to find answers, it's not human.
translation.zh: 我们为了找到答案而做的事 不是人事

translation.en: Are we still going to the hub?
We're gonna need, like, a book on mapping.
I-- I want to make sure that you understand how this works, okay?
translation.zh: 我想让你知道这是怎么弄的 好吧？

translation.en: Mom, I know how a library works.
translation.zh: 妈妈 我知道图书馆是怎么回事

translation.en: Yeah. The computers don't work anymore, so...
translation.zh: 对 不过电脑不能用了

translation.en: This is gonna be your new school.
translation.zh: 所以这会是你的新学校

translation.en: So, when mommy's gone, you'll need to find a library.
translation.zh: 所以 当妈妈不在的时候 你就要找到一个图书馆

translation.en: Okay? And... read. Don't stop reading, and I...
translation.zh: 好吧？ 然后读书 不停地读书

translation.en: ...and I need you to learn as much as you can, okay?
translation.zh: 你要尽量多学一点 好吗？

translation.en: Um, come with me over here.
Okay, look at me. I'm gonna teach you something very important, okay?
translation.zh: 好的 看着我 我要教你非常重要的事 好吧？

translation.en: I need you to learn how to shoot this gun, okay?
translation.zh: 你要学会怎么打这把枪 好吗？

translation.en: And, look at me, not just for people, but for animals too. All right?
translation.zh: 看着我 不光是防人 还要防动物 好吧？

translation.en: And we're gonna find you a rifle,
translation.zh: 咱们还要给你找一把步枪

translation.en: and you're gonna learn how to shoot that too,
because the world is different now, baby, okay?
translation.zh: 因为世界现在不一样了 宝贝 好吗？

translation.en: And you gotta be prepared for anything.
translation.zh: 你要为所有事作好准备
好吗？ 来吧 双手握枪

translation.en: Put two hands on the gun for me. There you go.
translation.zh: 来吧 双手握枪 对了 好的

translation.en: Hold onto it strong just like the handlebars of your bike.
translation.zh: 用力握好 就像握着你的自行车把手

translation.en: Put this foot forward. There we go. Nice strong stance, okay?
translation.zh: 一条腿在前 好的 姿态放稳 好吗？

translation.en: Keep both eyes open. And you see that eye groove?
translation.zh: 双眼睁开 看见准星了吗？

translation.en: I want you to look right through that, all right?

translation.zh: -玛蒂尔达 拜托了 -我不想要

translation.en: -Yes, Matilda! -We're gonna find a cure, okay?
translation.zh: -必须这样 玛蒂尔达！ -咱们能找到解方

translation.en: And you and Noah are gonna shoot the gun.

translation.zh: -我去车上 -等等 宝贝 过来

translation.en: No. Noah, I thought you were in the car.
translation.zh: 没有 诺亚 我以为你在车上

translation.en: I was here. I said I was here.
translation.zh: 我在这里 我说了在这里

translation.en: You said to find books on mapping.
Just don't shoot at me again, okay?
translation.zh: 别再朝我开枪了 好吗？

translation.en: [Noah] I think the coordinates lead here.
translation.zh: 我想坐标应该是要到这里

translation.en: I think it's 150 miles. I don't know. We haven't slept in four days.
translation.zh: 应该是240公里 不知道 我们四天没睡觉了

translation.en: I'm not stopping. I'm gonna hit you. I'm not stopping.
translation.zh: 我不会停 我会撞你

translation.en: Hey, I ain't gonna hurt you.
Just, hey, let me have the boy.
translation.zh: 哎 就把男孩交给我就好

translation.en: No, you can go. I'll let you go. Hey, give me the boy.
translation.zh: 你可以走 我放你走 把男孩交给我

translation.en: I'll let you-- I'll let you go.
I'm just messing around. I'm messing around.
We're all free men here. It's all good.
translation.zh: 我们都是自由人 没事

translation.en: Hey, can I-- Can I have that gun?
Noah, I'm gonna shoot at one.
translation.zh: 诺亚 我会开枪打一个人

translation.en: They're gonna scatter. You're gonna go inside and lock yourself in, okay?
translation.zh: 他们会散开 你进去把自己锁在里面 好吗？

translation.en: -Noah! -Hey, give me-- Give me the gun.

translation.zh: 诺亚 跑 诺亚 跑啊！

translation.en: Yeah, run, Noah, you pretty little bitch.
translation.zh: 对 跑啊 诺亚 帅气的小贱货
-上车啊 妈妈 求你了 -上车！

translation.en: -Who are you? -[man 15] Why does it matter?
translation.zh: 你是谁？ 有什么关系吗？

translation.en: -I said, "What's your name?" -Dodge! Dodge, call me Dodge.
translation.zh: -我问你 你叫什么名字？ -道奇！叫我道奇

translation.en: How did you get out, Dodge?
translation.zh: 你们怎么出来的 道奇？

translation.en: I was locked in the cells, guards were gone, okay?
translation.zh: 我之前被关在牢房里 警卫都走了 好吧？

translation.en: We were starving, and I thought that, you know, I was gonna die in there.
translation.zh: 我们饿的要死 我以为要死在里面了

translation.en: And then the guards came back and opened the cell.
translation.zh: 警卫又回来把牢房打开了

translation.en: -[Jill] You just walked out? -Yeah, I just walked out.
-Where are you heading? -I'm in a red fucking jumpsuit. Okay?
translation.zh: -去哪里？ -我他妈穿着红色囚服 好吧？

translation.en: There are no bullets in that.
There are no bullets in that gun.
I keep the keys. And we need gas.
translation.zh: 钥匙放我这里 咱们得加油

translation.en: [Jill] Okay, that should be clean enough.
translation.zh: 好的 应该够干净了

translation.en: So, you saw I put it in the gas tank, right?
translation.zh: 你看到我把它放进了油箱 对吧？

translation.en: And now I want you to just, um, suck on it like a straw,
translation.zh: 你用嘴吸 就像吸吸管一样

translation.en: but do it hard, and then when it comes out, put the gas in the tank.
translation.zh: 用力 当油出来的时候 放进油箱

translation.en: You're gonna put it in here, okay?
So your sister can sleep, huh?
translation.zh: 你妹妹睡得着 对吧？

translation.en: in the war. Oh, he served.
Come on, you can do it.
Come on, you gotta learn, Matilda. You got this.
translation.zh: 来吧 你得学习 玛蒂尔达 你没问题的

translation.en: -I drank it. -Okay, baby. It's okay. It's all right.
translation.zh: -我喝进去了 -好的 宝贝 没事的
哎 你妈很硬核啊 兄弟

translation.en: [sighing] She's getting Matilda ready in case we can't find a cure.
translation.zh: 她在让玛蒂尔达作好准备 以防找不到解方

translation.en: -She thinks I don't know what she's doing. -A cure?
translation.zh: -她以为我不知道她在干嘛 -解方？

translation.en: You guys are trying to find a cure?
You know, the funny thing is, I usually sleep, like,
translation.zh: 有意思的是 我通常夜里最多睡两三个小时

translation.en: two to three hours tops at night,
translation.zh: 我通常夜里最多睡两三个小时

translation.en: You know, you should probably hang onto it.
You, uh, look pretty mean pointing it at people.
translation.zh: 你用枪对着别人的时候很唬人

translation.en: Remember, two hands on the steering wheel.
translation.zh: 记住 两只手握住方向盘

translation.en: Okay, I was just telling you so you don't forget.
translation.zh: 好吧 我就是让你别忘记

translation.en: You always say I have a really good memory.
translation.zh: 你总是说我记忆力很好

translation.en: -Why do you think I'll forget? -Eyes on the road, please.
translation.zh: -为什么觉得我会忘记呢？ -眼睛请看路

translation.en: Fixing this car is gonna be so hard. Oh, man. Okay.
translation.zh: 修这辆车会很困难 哎！

translation.en: But there are books on that, okay? You hear?
translation.zh: 但是有书 好吧？听到了吗？

translation.en: Burn the books, man. Burn 'em all.
translation.zh: 把书烧掉 全部烧掉

translation.en: Can you maybe just not-- Focus on the road, please.
translation.zh: 能不能麻烦你… 请专心看路

translation.en: Not talk to her so she can concentrate, please.
translation.zh: 别跟她说话 她要集中注意力

translation.en: [Dodge] Enough people said that the Earth was flat, so the Earth was flat.
translation.zh: 以前很多人说地球是平的 所以地球就是平的

translation.en: Then, they said the Earth was round...
[Dodge laughing] Science? And who understands the science, huh?
Eyes on the road, please, always.
translation.zh: 眼睛看路 麻烦 一直要看路

translation.en: [Dodge] Enough people talk about something, right? Then it becomes fact.
Then they put it in the books, and then the book becomes fact.
translation.zh: 然后写进书里 然后书里的话就是事实了

translation.en: Then no one understands it anymore, no one even talks about it anymore.
translation.zh: 然后就没人懂了 也没人说了

translation.en: Fuck, this is why we gotta burn the books, man.
translation.zh: 操！这就是我们要烧书的原因

translation.en: You know, my grandmama, you know what she used to tell me?
translation.zh: 知道我奶奶以前跟我说什么吗？

translation.en: -Huh? -That all the world's problems could all disappear in one generation
translation.zh: 如果每个孩子 从小就忘记所有被教育的烂事

translation.en: if every kid grew up forgetting all the shit they were taught,
translation.zh: 所有没道理的烂事 这些烂事被教了无数次 以至于你都相信了

translation.en: the shit that doesn't make sense,
translation.zh: 这些烂事被教了无数次 以至于你都相信了

translation.en: but you're taught it enough times, you believe it.
translation.zh: 那世界上所有的问题 都可以在一代人的时间内消失

translation.en: Then we can actually live in a world where no one is starving...
translation.zh: 那我们生活的世界就不会再有饥饿

translation.en: I used to think she was crazy, though, Grandma.
translation.zh: 不过我以前觉得我奶奶疯了

translation.en: maybe she was on to something.
-Watch out. You see that there? -[Matilda] Yeah.
Go right around the car, just like that.
Slow down. Slow down, put the brake on.
Let's go, let's go, let's go, right now! Put your head down, Matilda!
translation.zh: 赶紧走！头低下 玛蒂尔达！

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa, why're you stopping the car? -You see those lights ahead? -[engine idling]
translation.zh: -哎 怎么停车了？ -看见前面的灯了吗？

translation.en: We have to get off the road.
Are you guys sure you don't want me to stick around and maybe help with whatever y'all are doing?
translation.zh: 真的不要我留下帮忙吗？

translation.en: No, you go to where you need to get.
translation.zh: 不用了 你去你要去的地方吧
好的 再见 道奇

translation.en: It's time for me to get the fuck out of Dodge.
Hey, why'd we stop at this place?
translation.zh: 哎 我们为什么在这里停留？

translation.en: We're just gonna, um... I'm gonna just go first, okay? Make sure it's safe.
translation.zh: 我先去 好吗？去看看是不是安全

translation.en: If I don't come back, I want you to stay in this house, okay?
translation.zh: 如果我不回来 你们就留在这座房子里 好吗？

translation.en: There's enough food to last you about a week.
translation.zh: 这里的食物足够你们吃一周

translation.en: [whispering] It's just in case. It's just in case.
And if anyone comes, I want you to hide.
translation.zh: 如果有人来 你们就躲起来
好吗？尤其是如果男人来 好吗？

translation.en: It's just in-- It's just in case. It's just in case.
-[special op 1] Diaz, we're going up. -[special op 2] Let's go.
[special op 1] I'll take them up. You watch the bridge.
translation.zh: 我带他们去 你看着桥

translation.en: -[woman 13] I can't do this. -[man 17] Just keep taking the meds.
translation.zh: 我受不了了 用他们给你的药 会帮助你工作
用他们给你的药 会帮助你工作

translation.en: [woman 13] I don't have training on the hemopurifier. I'm not equipped for--
translation.zh: 我没有接受过这种设备的训练 我没有能力…

translation.en: [man 17] Ah, shit, what was the code? I wrote it down.
translation.zh: 妈的 密码是什么？我之前写下来的

translation.en: Come on. Please, please, please, please.

translation.zh: 好的 对不起 我…

translation.en: Where's the woman, uh, that can sleep?
translation.zh: 那个能睡着的女人在哪里？

translation.en: Yeah, I need blood-- I need to take blood samples.
How much blood can you take from me?
translation.zh: 你们能从我身上抽多少血啊？

translation.en: It's okay, I'm not gonna hurt you.
translation.zh: 没事 我不会伤害你

translation.en: Good. I can help you with that.
translation.zh: 好的 我可以帮助你

translation.en: You need to raise my daughter.
I have a little girl. She's ten years old,
and she needs you to help her in the new world.
translation.zh: 在新世界 她需要你帮助她

translation.en: She can't make it on her own.
She needs somebody to help her.
Okay? She needs someone to help her. You're the only one who can do it.
translation.zh: 好吗？她需要有人帮助她 你是唯一能帮她的人

translation.en: In the next few days, the rest of us are gonna be dead, okay?
translation.zh: 在今后的几天中 我们其余人都会死 好吧？

translation.en: I'm gonna take you out of here.
I'm the one that needs help.
[inhales deeply] I was supposed to be dead months ago.
translation.zh: 我本来几个月前就应该死了

translation.en: You're crazier than the rest of them.
After you left the campus, Brian helped me with the coordinates.
translation.zh: 你离开校园之后 布莱恩帮我找到了坐标

translation.en: My family, are-- are they with you?
translation.zh: 我的家人和你在一起吗？

translation.en: I'm-- I didn't see him again. So I'm assuming he was here.
translation.zh: 我… 我之后没再见到他 所以我以为他来这里了

translation.en: It's been six days, and we're no closer.
translation.zh: 已经六天了 还是毫无进展

translation.en: We have, um, a cocktail that helps with mental acuity,
translation.zh: 我们有一种鸡尾酒疗法 能够帮助提升精神敏锐性

translation.en: but it's-- it's causing some... neurological damage.
translation.zh: 但是会导致一些神经损伤

translation.en: But it is... It's buying us some time.
translation.zh: 但是给我们争取了一点时间

translation.en: maybe the only answer... we're gonna get is...
translation.zh: 也许我们能得到的唯一答案

translation.en: that none of us are gonna survive.
translation.zh: 是我们谁都不可能活下来

translation.en: I mean, that must mean something.
get situated, and let's get to work.
translation.zh: 安顿下来 然后工作吧

translation.en: -Get down! On your knees! -Get out of the car.
-[Dodge] Don't shoot, okay? -[soldier] Get down on your knees!
translation.zh: -不是吧 -别开枪 好吗？ -跪下！ -别开枪！

translation.en: -Okay, okay, I'm here to help! -Get out of the car.
translation.zh: -好的 我是来帮忙的！ -下车！

translation.en: -[Dodge] I'm here to help. -Show me your fucking hands!
translation.zh: -我是来帮忙的 -手他妈举起来！

translation.en: -[soldier 2] I'll blow your head off! -[cries out]
I will shoot you in the fucking face!
-[soldier 3] Get out of the car. Hands up! -[Dodge] Okay, don't shoot!
translation.zh: 下车 -好的 别开枪！ -举起手来

translation.en: -[Dodge] We're here to help. Okay? -Keep moving! Show me your hands! Go!
translation.zh: -我们是来帮忙的 好吗？ -往前走 手举起来！ 走！

translation.en: -[soldier 1] Keep moving! -[Dodge] She's just a little girl!
And we need to find out what makes you so special.
translation.zh: 我们得弄清楚你为什么会与众不同

translation.en: [Katz] Oh, yeah, she is still alive.
We, um... had to ease the tension by...
A catch-22. The only way to ease the tension is to drain the fluid,
translation.zh: 《第二十二条军规》悖论 放松的唯一办法是抽掉脑脊液

translation.en: the only way to clean the brain is the fluid.
translation.zh: 清洗大脑的唯一方法是脑脊液

translation.en: You're such a brave, sweet girl.
translation.zh: 你是个勇敢而善良的姑娘

translation.en: Most animals are able to sleep...
translation.zh: 多数动物在此次事件之后 都能睡着

translation.en: after the incident, but chimps, well...
translation.zh: 多数动物在此次事件之后 都能睡着 但是黑猩猩是最接近人类的

translation.en: they were always closest to humans.
translation.zh: 但是黑猩猩是最接近人类的

translation.en: I'm Dr. Murphy, I'm-- I'm a friend of your mom's.
translation.zh: 我是墨菲医生 我是你妈妈的朋友

translation.en: [Katz] Uh, we're gonna, um... try the ether on you now, Matilda.
translation.zh: 我们会尝试对你用乙醚 玛蒂尔达

translation.en: -To prove that you're special. -[Matilda] Will it hurt?
translation.zh: 以证明你是特殊的 会疼吗？

translation.en: [Katz] No, we're not gonna hurt you. I'm a doctor.
translation.zh: 不会 我们不会伤害你 我是医生

translation.en: I... I want to be disappointed...
that you didn't tell me about Matilda after all I've done for you.
translation.zh: 我为你做了这么多事 你却没有告诉我玛蒂尔达的情况

translation.en: But, as a mother, I understand.
translation.zh: 但是作为一个母亲 我理解

translation.en: How long have I been here?
Has she had any, um... any surgeries?
translation.zh: 她有没有做过什么手术？

translation.en: How long have I been here?
It was, um... some sort of a... a solar flare, we think.
It... changed our electromagnetic wiring. It affected our glymphatic system.
translation.zh: 改变了我们的电磁线束 影响了我们的胶状淋巴系统
把我们的生物钟弄乱了

translation.en: Jill, your survival-- Our-- Our survival depends on Matilda.
translation.zh: 吉尔 你的命 我们的命 都要取决于玛蒂尔达
噢 不要 求你了

translation.en: Oh, no, please, please. No, no, no, that's my baby. That's my baby.
translation.zh: 不要 求你了 她是我的宝贝啊

translation.en: That's my baby girl. Please just take, like, blood samples or something, please!
translation.zh: 她是我的女儿啊 不要采她的血样 求你了！

translation.en: [woman 13] Come on. Let's get you cleaned up.
translation.zh: 来吧 给你收拾一下

translation.en: It's a cocktail of anti-inflammatories, stimulants, other things.
translation.zh: 这是一组消炎药 兴奋剂等药物的混合物

translation.en: Um, it's most effective when injected near the brain.
translation.zh: 在脑补附近注射最有效

translation.en: Defib. Hey! I need your help! Okay. Okay, come on.
translation.zh: 除颤器 哎！要你帮忙！ 好的 快点
-好的 好了 -好吗？充电 -正在充电 -离手！
-你在弄疼她 -我们在想办法重启她的心脏

translation.en: [Katz] We're trying to restart her heart. Do it again.
translation.zh: -你在弄疼她 -我们在想办法重启她的心脏 再来

translation.en: [nurse] It's all the spiders in here. There's too many.
translation.zh: 妈的 这里好多蜘蛛

translation.en: We have to get rid of the spiders.
-It's all the spiders in here. -[Murphy] Well...
translation.zh: -这里到处都是蜘蛛 -咱们把他哥哥带过来

translation.en: Let's get her brother up here... so we can compare them.
translation.zh: -这里到处都是蜘蛛 -咱们把他哥哥带过来 把他们进行对比

translation.en: [Noah] You wanted to find a stranger to leave Matilda with.
translation.zh: 你想要找个陌生人 把玛蒂尔达托付给她

translation.en: I guess that's what you do.
translation.zh: 你大概就是会做这种事吧

translation.en: You rely on other people to raise your kids.
translation.zh: 依靠其他人来养自己的孩子

translation.en: Why did you bring me here? Why'd you make me think it was just for me? Why?
translation.zh: 为什么要把我带到这里来？ 你为什么觉得是为了我好？

translation.en: Hey, you? You're coming with us.
No. No, no. No, no, no.
No, no, no, no, please! Please, please, please!
No, don't take-- Don't take my other baby, please.
translation.zh: 不要啊！别又带走我另一个孩子 求你了！

translation.en: [crying] Please don't take my other baby.
translation.zh: 求你别又带走我另一个孩子！

translation.en: -Fuck. Everything's gonna be just fine. -[soldiers yelling]
-[soldier 1] We're taking fire! -[soldier 2] I'm on it.
[Katz] No one's attacking. They're losing their minds.
translation.zh: 没人在攻击 他们疯了
她没事吧？你没事 好的 我知道我们可以的

translation.en: -I know we can do this. -[glass breaking]
translation.zh: 好的 我知道我们可以的

translation.en: -Get down on the fucking ground! -Okay, okay.
-Yeah. Yes! -[soldiers screaming in the distance] Yes, yes, it's me!
[crazed soldier] Don't fucking look at me!
If you move, I swear I'll blow your fucking head off!
translation.zh: 你动一下 我发誓一定打爆你的头！

translation.en: Hey! He's just a kid! You're just seeing things, okay?
translation.zh: 哎 他只是个孩子！ 你有幻觉了 好吧？没人在攻击我们
你有幻觉了 好吧？没人在攻击我们

translation.en: -[groaning] -No, no, no, no. You're good, you're good.
[Katz] We're sacrificing the child for no reason.
translation.zh: 我们是在毫无理由地牺牲这个孩子

translation.en: [Matilda] No! No, no, no! Oh, no!
Jill, I-I-I can't let you take her.
translation.zh: 吉尔 我不能让你带走她

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no, no.
-What are you doing? -[Katz] Put the knife down.
-He didn't remove the air from the needle. -[Murphy groaning]
translation.zh: 他没有排除针管里的空气

translation.en: You have to remove the air, or you can die.
translation.zh: 必须排除空气 否则会死

translation.en: Where's Noah? We have to find him.
translation.zh: 诺亚在哪里？咱们得找到他

translation.en: Dad taught me how to do this.
-You gut fish from the head to the tail. -Noah, don't touch that!
translation.zh: -杀鱼要从头到尾 -诺亚 别碰！

translation.en: Please wake up for me, please! Mom! Please, Noah, please! [grunting]

translation.zh: 好的 醒醒啊 诺亚
来 宝宝 妈妈在这里

translation.en: Please wake up for me, all right? Wake up for me, please.
Wake up! Mommy's here, wake up!
translation.zh: 醒醒！妈妈在这里 醒醒！

translation.en: [Matilda] Okay. Okay, I got it. That's it. Turn it on. Put the pads on.
translation.zh: 好的 拿到了 就用这个 打开

translation.en: -[Jill panting] Okay. -[Matilda] Adjust. [Jill] I can't. -[Matilda] Okay.
translation.zh: -好的 我打不开 -调整一下 好的

translation.en: -[Jill] I need help. -[Matilda] Come on! Come on!

translation.zh: 哎 妈妈 他没死
妈妈 能听到我说话吗？

translation.en: about not wanting to come here.
to try to find someone to help Matilda.
translation.zh: 应该找人来帮玛蒂尔达

translation.en: Your heart wasn't beating, I listened to it.
translation.zh: 你的心脏之前停跳了 我听了

translation.en: And then when I got the defibrillator, I brought you back.
translation.zh: 然后我拿来了除颤器 把你救活了
对 我欠你一条命 好吧？

translation.en: We don't have lots of time to discuss it. Mom's not gonna make it.
translation.zh: 我们没多少时间讨论这个 妈妈不行了

translation.en: [Matilda] Did I die? Did I die, too?
-What? -In the water, when the sheriff saved me.
translation.zh: -什么？ -在水里 当警察救我的时候

translation.en: I mean, there was nothing, absolutely nothing,
and then the sheriff was pushing on my chest, he was hurting me.
translation.zh: 然后警察按我的胸口 弄得我很痛

translation.en: You have to trust me, Mom.
